ValidationRule.description: Dog can be certified only after 6 months of activation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(ActivationDate__c)), ADDMONTHS(ActivationDate__c, 6) >= Today(), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), 'Active')), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Active'), NOT(ISNULL(MicrochipNumber__c)), SpayedNeutered__c = TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Dog can be certified only after 6 months from Activation Date, need to be Spayed/Neutered and need to have Microchip number.
